comment: Nice smell, very mild and easy on the tongue. Very young.

Received as a gift.
Nose: aroma of pecans, vanilla, cherry. Very pleasing!
Palate: sweet, notes of creme brûlée, vanilla, mild hint of smoke, and subtle flavor of toffee.
Finish: mouthfeel was subtle, after the flavors of each sip passed, there was little aftertaste. Very little alcohol burn. 
Overall: great introduction from this distiller. Possibly more time in the barrel may lend to a different flavor profile, but this current offering has plenty to offer. Thoroughly enjoyed this dram!
I'm at the distillery and the server really hates her life right now, definitely because of these clowns I'm with
